resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to replicate:
# Ensure you are using the old python-based CLI
# Package an iOS app for distribution
# Note the following in the console:
# The packaging does seem to succeed--it just doesn't switch windows correctly

{code}
Error when packaging for Xcode
[INFO] Titanium SDK version: 3.0.0 (10/19/12 15:33 5343af8)
[INFO] iPhone Device family: universal
[INFO] iPhone SDK version: 6.0
[INFO] Performing full rebuild. This will take a little bit. Hold tight...
/Users/ingo/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.0.0.v20121019153308/iphone/xcode_organizer.scpt: execution error: System Events got an error: Canâ€™t get window 1 of process "Xcode". Invalid index. (-1719)
[TRACE] app property, acs-oauth-secret-production : DBoHzXmhx0N5GYj0JPEcvaTipZMHdn83
[TRACE] app property, acs-oauth-key-production : e6Il4ArTI0TrFFCfXPPTHwHYlsoFTBoH
[TRACE] app property, acs-api-key-production : z6CafiVUNetv2WL9JdPvXTsSjewfoyNt
[TRACE] app property, acs-oauth-secret-development : ebx1FayAhe8hKbEOa6FS4ZGiAwYwTjVP
[TRACE] app property, acs-oauth-key-development : rI7f68klBQez9OSVMgBvKMaXpcDlRDti
[TRACE] app property, acs-api-key-development : fzDO7lQd28XMVb0rQ2GbnYaRM5auhCMy
[TRACE] app property, ti.ui.defaultunit : system
{code}
fields.summary: CLI: XCode not launching organizer to correct page

comments.body: Max, please submit a pull request for 3_0_X too!

iOS app is packaged successfully, xcode organizer window opens up, having the app in Archives

Verified on :
SDK version:  3.1.0.v20130111163212
CLI version : old python based CLI
OS : MAC OSX 10.7.5
XCode : 4.5.1

Closing.
Tested and verified with:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK, build: 3.0.2.v20130124094710
XCode 4.5.2
